name: Mary wants to play
description:
Mary wants to play with you but what kind of game is that? Is it even a game ?

Control the poor little doll to her journey, in this house and help her to discover the truth behind everything... or maybe not, just let her to what she wants to do.

An original game with short ends, estimate time : about 30min to 1 hour

CONTROL :

  • Use "Space bar" or "Enter key" to do or valid an action
  • Use "Escape key" to cancel or open the menu
  • You can move using the "Arrow keys" and running by holding "Shift key"
  • Use "Alt + F4" to shut down the game.
  • You can do "Alt + Enter key" for the fullscreen of cancel it.

WARNING :

  • There is some flash in the game.
  • There is a minor presence of blood.
